name: Chopsticks
description:
Chopsticks is a remake of the classic hand game of the same name. Players take turns attacking each other with the goal of eliminating the other player's hands and winning the game.

This project was mainly started to gain experience with Python and game making.

How To Play:

1. Pick a hand to attack with

2. Select an opponent's hand to attack or your other hand to split

3. If splitting select the amount of points to give to the other hand

Extra: Reselecting a highlighted side will cancel the selection.
